thread.title: Zuckerberg unscathed but pressure on Facebook grows

title: Zuckerberg unscathed but pressure on Facebook grows
text:
Zuckerberg unscathed but pressure on Facebook grows 3:23pm BST - 01:50 
Facebook Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg emerged from 10 hours of questions over two days from nearly 100 U.S. lawmakers largely unscathed. But, as Ciara Lee reports, there is mounting pressure for tougher regulation for social media platforms in the wake of the Cambridge Analytica data misuse scandal.
